entry.title: [Global][Managed Services] - Managed Baremetal
entry.content:
Oct 13, 16:53 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/10/2022 06:00 UTC
End Time : 13/10/2022 16:30 UTC
Root cause :Some disturbance on the network caused this malfunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 13, 14:23 UTC
Identified - Update : The backlog of tasks is being dealt with.

Oct 13, 12:18 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 13/10/2022 06:00 UTC
Service impact : Add and remove baremetal actions on vrack can suffer of latencies.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating on the issue.
Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [SBG3][Dedicated Servers] - S330B02
entry.content:
Oct 13, 08:44 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 12/10/2022 09:00 UTC
End Time : 12/10/2022 09:40 UTC
Service impacted : Some servers were unavailable on rack S330B02.
Root cause : The incident was caused by a faulty multisocket which tripped the circuit breaker.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

entry.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - G101B09
entry.content:

Root cause : A failure on a network equipment.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 13, 06:55 UTC
Identified - Start time : 13/10/2022 06:14 UTC
Service impact : All servers in this rack G101B09 are currently unreachable
Root cause : A failure on a network equipment.
Ongoing actions : Our technical team works on the replacement of the defective equipment.
